tool.name: Strand Bias Filter
tool.description: Filter based on bias in alternate and reference read direction.
tool.command:
python $__tool_directory__/filter_strand.py "${infile}" "${outfile}" #if $strandbias_flag --strandbias_flag "${strandbias_flag}" #end if
#if $method_select.method --method "${method_select.method}" #end if
#if str($method_select.method) == "hoeffding" #if $method_select.conf --conf "${method_select.conf}" #end if #end if

param.name: method
param.label: Method to use to access strand bias. Choices: adjust_alts, hoeffding.

tool.help: Filter based on bias in alternate and reference read direction.
